page.title: 01RESUME
page.content: A small rural area devoted to farming set deep in the heart of the Essex countryside. Low rainfall making the area suitable for the growing of cereals. No village. Scattered cottages and houses only. Major buildings,an Anglican church and Spains Hall,an Elizabethan manor house. Fine old period farmhouses Limited amenities for health services, recreation,banking,shopping,schools and theatres. People go to neighbouring villages and towns. Small population approx.250. Mainly people born or working in the area. Small commuter element. Few retired. Small number of 'weekenders'. The area is basically arable fields,bounded by hedges,copses and a great abundance of wild flowers in spring and summer months enhancing the beautiful landscape of the whole area.
